title: قانون رقم 155 لسنة 2002
title_en: Law No. 155 of 2002 Concerning Export Development
description: Law 155/2002 aims to develop Egyptian exports by establishing a support fund, facilitating procedures, encouraging producers, and enhancing competitiveness in global markets. [PDF: https://portal.investment.gov.eg/publiclaws/download/23]
